extracted_playbook.title: Update Tecnomatix Plant Simulation V2302
extracted_playbook.description: Update Tecnomatix Plant Simulation V2302 to version V2302.0016 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Tecnomatix Plant Simulation V2404
extracted_playbook.description: Update Tecnomatix Plant Simulation V2404 to version V2404.0005 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted WRL Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted WRL files in affected applications to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Operate devices in a protected IT environment by configuring according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including defense-in-depth strategies and targeted cyber intrusion detection and mitigation.
